parameters.query:
SELECT 
  q.id,
  q.question_code,
  q.category,
  q.subcategory,
  q.difficulty,
  q.global_accuracy_rate,
  q.total_attempts,
  q.keywords,
  ae.id as explanation_id,
  ae.media_type,
  ae.video_timestamps
FROM questions q
LEFT JOIN atomic_explanations ae ON q.id = ae.question_id AND ae.media_type = 'video_casual'
WHERE 
  q.is_active = TRUE
  AND q.needs_improvement = FALSE
  AND q.global_accuracy_rate < $1
  AND q.total_attempts >= $2
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM priority_render_queue prq 
    WHERE prq.question_id = q.id AND prq.status IN ('pending', 'processing')
  )
ORDER BY q.global_accuracy_rate ASC
LIMIT $3

INSERT INTO priority_render_queue (
  question_id,
  category,
  priority,
  trigger_reason,
  trigger_data,
  target_media,
  target_languages,
  special_instructions,
  status,
  queued_at
) VALUES (
  $1, $2, $3, $4, $5::jsonb, $6, $7::text[], $8, 'pending', NOW()
) RETURNING id

UPDATE questions SET 
  needs_improvement = TRUE,
  improvement_reason = $2,
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = $1
